txt.en: This Ent is not dissimilar from Ashlimb. It is apparent in his eyes that he mulls upon some memory with interest, but has grown too sleepy to do anything but mull.
The Ent looks at you knowingly. It is clear that he is curious about what may have happened to this injured man.
You have the sensation of recalling a memory that is not your own....
The Ent you encountered has a memory he wishes to impart upon you, for he is too sleepy to pursue his own interests.
The Ent Baillas can be found towards the central southern edge of Fangorn Forest.\n\nYou should speak with Baillas to learn the memory upon which he dwells.
The Ent Baillas can be found towards the central southern edge of Fangorn Forest.\n\nYou should speak with Baillas.
